article_title: Graduate health insurance: How other schools did it
article_text:
Columbia, MO (65201)

Today

Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 87F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening, then cloudy skies overnight. Low around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , graduate walkout, graduate insurance, university of south carolina, university of alabama, internal revenue service, louisiana state university, mississippi state university, health insurance costs
article_metadata.author: Ruth Serven

og.description: Officials at Louisiana State University, the University of South Carolina and the University of Alabama changed or canceled their graduate student health insurance plans weeks before MU acted.
